channel.title: How to change your ip
channel.description: ok guys i really want to use my no-ip IP so that every time my ip changes people dont need to keep putting the new one in.. i have a no-ip IP its called insanityscap.no-ip.biz and its chek marked now how do i make sure it works because when i tried to add a server on mopar it said server must be online so what do i do?

item.title: How to change your ip
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Make sure that you have portforwarded and people are able to connect to you in the first place. Then, make sure your No-ip smiley face is blushing. Sometimes restarting No-ip after updating also works for me.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change your ip
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

kk but how can i do it so it can work?

Read full topic

item.title: How to change your ip
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“italy544, post:3, topic:342641”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=439041.msg3226380#msg3226380 date=1275607326]

ok guys i really want to use my no-ip IP so that every time my ip changes people dont need to keep putting the new one in… i have a no-ip IP its called insanityscap.no-ip.biz and its chek marked now how do i make sure it works because when i tried to add a server on mopar it said server must be online so what do i do?

i no that, im saying for people to connect to my server instead of connect to 70.53… ect they can connect to insanityscap.no-ip.bix because the 70.53… will change like every month

If you’re trying to connect to a server, running on your machine, and you’re trying to connect to it, on your machine, you MUST set the IP to 127.0.0.1. If the server is hosted elsewhere, you put the no-ip address.
[/quote][/quote]

No it wont. Not if you use the No-IP DUC on the machine that’s running the server…

Read full topic

item.title: How to change your ip
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:342641”][quote author=italy544 link=topic=439041.msg3226374#msg3226374 date=1275607248]
ok guys i really want to use my no-ip IP so that every time my ip changes people dont need to keep putting the new one in… i have a no-ip IP its called insanityscap.no-ip.biz and its chek marked now how do i make sure it works because when i tried to add a server on mopar it said server must be online so what do i do?
[/quote]
i no that, im saying for people to connect to my server instead of connect to 70.53… ect they can connect to insanityscap.no-ip.bix because the 70.53… will change like every month

If you’re trying to connect to a server, running on your machine, and you’re trying to connect to it, on your machine, you MUST set the IP to 127.0.0.1. If the server is hosted elsewhere, you put the no-ip address.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How to change your ip
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

italy544:

ok guys i really want to use my no-ip IP so that every time my ip changes people dont need to keep putting the new one in… i have a no-ip IP its called insanityscap.no-ip.biz and its chek marked now how do i make sure it works because when i tried to add a server on mopar it said server must be online so what do i do?

If you’re trying to connect to a server, running on your machine, and you’re trying to connect to it, on your machine, you MUST set the IP to 127.0.0.1. If the server is hosted elsewhere, you put the no-ip address.

Read full topic
